reporter_caption.center: MATTER OF SIPAL REALTY CORPORATION, 4 N.Y.2d 1026 (1958)

caption.center: In the Matter of SIPAL REALTY CORPORATION, Respondent.
MARTIN L. DANKERS et al., Appellants.

court.center: Court of Appeals of the State of New York.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Appellate Division of the Supreme Court in the first judicial department, ARTHUR MARKEWICH, J.Page 1028
opinion.attorneys:
William L. Messing for appellants.
Theodore B. Wolf and Frederick B. Sussmann for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
Order affirmed, with costs. Question certified answered in the negative. No opinion.
Concur: Chief Judge CONWAY and Judges DESMOND, DYE, FULD, FROESSEL, VAN VOORHIS and BURKE.
